participant_1.background:
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
my sister is a published author.
my favorite color is black.

i hope to visit quebec , canada someday.
I remember my mother fondly, but it's been hard since she passed away.
I've been with my husband for 10 years.
i want to move to las vegas.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older. How about you?
Hi! I'm also looking forward to more free time, but I'm also kind of sad that my mom passed away recently.
I'm so sorry to hear about your mom. :( What was she like?
She was the best! She was always so kind and supportive, and she always knew how to make me laugh.
She sounds like an amazing person. I'm glad you had her in your life.
Thanks, me too. She's left a big hole in my heart, but I know she'll always be with me.
I'm sure she will. Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I have two sisters. We're all pretty close, and we're really helping each other through this.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you have your sisters to support you.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and play the piano. I also like to go for walks in the park.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and write too. I'm not very good at the piano, though.
That's okay! I'm not very good at it either, but I still enjoy it.
Me too. I'm glad we have something in common.
